..? No, not just that. Yes, in the opposite direction?

These are stalker tales. Themselves all the miracles about the Zone napridumyvayut, and then whole crowds wander, looking for where it is. In a word, do not pay attention: these are all fairy tales. Like the Klondike of artifacts or the Executor of Desires.

Ah, it's kind of like the place where the wounds heal themselves, and the forces recover for a minute... Forget it's not like that. This stalkers are invented so that the Zone is not so terrible. Only the reality is completely different: there are no safe places in the Zone. Here it is necessary to take care of survival itself, but dreamers - they do not hold out for a long time.

Yeah, and even there on a silver platter with a blue kaemochka artifact is the price of nemeren... I'm kidding. Of course, it would be nice to know where you can just come and without any medics get well, but only dreams of it.

They say that there is a way from "Jupiter". I mean, from the factory. Not from the one behind the asteroids, no. Well, that's what I drove!

Easy. One of our detachment saw a dried-up lake, so you those fighters fit in all parameters. Pripyat they need to know how their five fingers, and they are desperate - stopudovo, the best you will not find. "Monoliths" still, ho-ho!

Why not tell, I will. Here's the Tramp, the main one for our new guys... it's clear that he does not have something for us. His soldiers are nothing, normally merged, and he himself... In general, you throw him your subject - maybe he will drive? It's a shame to watch a good man toil.
No-ah... no steering at all.
